clang-analyzer-security.FloatLoopCounter.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-security.FloatLoopCounter
Warn on using a floating point value as a loop counter (CERT: FLP30-C,
FLP30-CPP).
The
clang-analyzer-security.FloatLoopCounter
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-security.FloatLoopCounter.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
